post: More importantly, if all the testing is discounted, we are left with a most important fact.The Sudarium has been in Oviedo, Spain since the 7th century. I believe since 631 AD. This is fact.When the Sudarium and The Shroud of Turin face are aligned, the blood spots exactly line up. The Sudarium and the Shroud of Turin both have the rare blood type AB.This alone should be cause for alarm, with respect to the C14 dating of the shroud. The C14 should have, at least, dated the shroud to the 7th century.Best,Tamara Beryl Latham.
title: Shroud of Turin may not be a fake after all!

author: tamara_beryl_latham
post: It doesn’t take a rocket scientist. The proof that the Shroud of Turin is Jesus is in the stars! If you download the “Hand of God” image taken by the NASA Chandra telescope, which is 17,000 light years away (1700 years old), you will see this image is the same facial image as that on the Shroud of Turin. Then, download the picture of the head napkin of Christ that has been in Oviedo, Spain since the 700s. Once you download this picture, take a picture of the downloaded picture with your camera. The same image as that of the Shroud of Turin appears. Both the Shroud image, the Chandra image and the Oviedo image are the same face. This IS the face of Jesus. The Chandra image even details the crown of thorns in red. See links. Chandra :: Photo Album :: PSR B1509 58 :: 3 April 09 Blog: A Young Pulsar Shows its Hand … ray nebula that spans 150 light years. title: Sky News Interview with Thomas De Wesselow

author: tamara_beryl_latham
post: Ron, another thing that I found equally amazing is when Secondo Pia took a photo of the face on the linen shroud and then developed it, the negative displayed the face of Jesus. And this is the face we see today with the photo image taken by Barrie Schwortz. I did the same experiment. Download an image of the Sudarium of Oviedo and print it out, and then take a picture of the printed image with your camera. The face that appears is the exact image as that facial image on the Shroud. And I mean exact, with the long nose, small lips, eyes, beard, etc. So, in conclusion the face appears on the Oviedo cloth, dated 700s. The same face appears on the Sudarium (Carbon dating was off) and the same face appears in the sky somewhere around 300 AD (CE). What one should wonder is what happened around 300 AD that Jesus found it so necessary to appear in the sky? I haven’t researched this extensively, but I did find in 303 AD, according to Michael Baigent in “The Jesus Papers,” that it was the beginning of the Christians being persecuted by Diocletian, Emperor of Rome, and there was massive destruction and deaths. With that in mind, I wondered if the Chandra image could be dated to 303 AD? I suppose NASA could do the calculations. What needs to be shown is all three images side by side. There is no doubt all three are of the same man. Best, Tamara Beryl Latham.
